definition: to let slip/loss of speech (e.g. as a result of brain damage)/aphasia
primary progressive aphasia (PPA), speech disorder (sometimes related to dementia)
pinyin: yuan2 fa1 xing4 jin4 xing2 xing4 shi1 yu3
pi2 ceng2 xia4 shi1 yu3 zheng4

sentences.english: Are networks for residual language function and recovery consistent across aphasic patients?
sentences.chinese: 失语症患者残余语言功能和恢复网络一致吗？

sentences.english: Standing in front of paintings of Dali Zhang, I lose my words.
sentences.chinese: 站在张大力的一幅幅画作面前，常常令人哑然失语。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the role of communicative theory patterns with aphasia patients in neurosurgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨沟通理论在神经外科失语病人中的运用价值。

sentences.english: And art made tongue-tied by authority.
sentences.chinese: 学术结舌失语，饱受当局钳制。

sentences.english: Severity of expressive aphasia varies among patients.
sentences.chinese: 表达性失语症的严重程度各个不一。
失语症的神经语言分析。

sentences.english: Aphasia can be studied in order to discover how the brain processes language.
sentences.chinese: 通过研究失语症可以揭示大脑是如何处理语言的。

sentences.english: Three weeks later, his right hemiparesis worsened and motor aphasia developed.
sentences.chinese: 三星期以后右侧偏瘫恶化并发生运动性失语症。

sentences.english: Amusia is a kind of aphasia.
sentences.chinese: 失歌症是失语症的一种。

sentences.english: He was aphasic , they explained to the girl.
sentences.chinese: 他们对女孩说他患了失语症。

sentences.english: Male dominance in language coerces women to the state of silence.
sentences.chinese: 男性在语言上的主导地位致使女性处于失语的处境。

sentences.english: Aphasia is characterized by verbal auditory agnosia. Psychological and behavioral abnormalities are very common in children with LKS.
sentences.chinese: 失语表现为听觉失认，多伴有其他精神行为异常。

sentences.english: Objective: To study the treatment and the effects of anomic difficulty caused by aphasia.
sentences.chinese: 探讨失语所致命名障碍治疗方法及治疗效果。

sentences.english: Apraxia of speech and Dysarthria are other speech disorders that may be confused with aphasia.
sentences.chinese: 有构音障碍和言语失用等，可能会与演讲失常失语。

sentences.english: The Chinese animation industry has gradually declined and become culturally "aphasic".
sentences.chinese: 中国动画逐渐衰落，患上了文化“失语症”。

sentences.english: Research shows that is quite common for people with aphasia to become depressed.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，是颇常见的人与失语，成为低迷。

definition: paralysis of one side of the body/hemiplegia
to be delirious/to be mentally confused
to remain silent/to have nothing to say
